ADAPTIVITY - without a doubt, one of the most important qualities of the site❗ 
 nStatistics shows that most users view sites from mobile devices. Therefore, if your site is not responsive, you can lose a considerable share of traffic - and customers, respectively. 
 nWhen creating an adaptive website, it is also important to take into account the features of a separate browser and operating systems. 
 nOur team is developing responsive websites for all types devices. The main goal for us is a quality product that provides you with high conversions)

What is a Landing page and who should use such a site? 
 nThis is a one-page site that is dedicated to one product or service. 
 
 This type of site is ideal for advertising purposes, when it is necessary to get new customers in a short time. 
 nLanding information should be accessible and concise, so that the visitor does not dissipate and he has a desire to take the necessary action: call, fill out an application, purchase goods.
